headline: Nike (NKE) Valuation In Focus After Insider Buying By Elliott Hill And Tim Cook
summary: Recent open market share purchases by CEO Elliott Hill and board member Tim Cook have pushed NIKE (NKE) back into focus as investors weigh this insider confidence against ongoing revenue, margin, and China related challenges. See our latest analysis for NIKE. NIKE’s recent insider buying has arrived during a period where short term momentum is picking up, with a 7 day share price return of 6.8%. However, the 1 year total shareholder return of a 7.2% decline and the 3 year total shareholder...
